creator: Al-Yamama, Zarqaa
description-english: The article features a review of a message sent by feminist writer, Mai Ziada to Malak Hifni Nassef (better known by her pen name of Bahithat al-Badiya) in 1913 rejecting masculine reservations about women’s emancipation.
description-arabic: تستعرض المقالة الرسالة التي أرسلتها الكاتبة مي زيادة إلى باحثة البادية في سنة 1913 والتي تهاجم فيها الرجال لعدم اعترافهم بحرية المرأة.
subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
rights: Women and Memory Forum are copyright holders of the Bint al-Nil Journal Collection.
repository: Rare Books and Special Collections Digital Library
